alert.note: Alert for Pierce (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 9:17PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dakota, northwestern Goodhue, southwestern Washington and southwestern Pierce Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 917 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rosemount, or 13 miles south of St. Paul, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hastings around 925 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cannon Falls, Welch and Red Wing. This includes U.S. Highway 61 between mile markers 89 and 104. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
